org.apache.giraph.io.formats

类 GiraphFileInputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<K,V>
        • org.apache.giraph.io.formats.GiraphFileInputFormat<K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - Key
    V - Value
    直接已知子类:
    GiraphTextInputFormat

    public abstract class GiraphFileInputFormat<K,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat<K,V>
    Provides functionality similar to FileInputFormat, but allows for different data sources (vertex and edge data).

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.input.FileInputFormat

                      org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                               throws IOException
        Add a Path to the list of vertex inputs.
        参数:
        conf - the Configuration to store the input paths
        path - Path to be added to the list of vertex inputs
        抛出:
        IOException
